product_name: The North Face Nimble Pants - Men's
long_description: The North Face Nimble Pants for men are wind-resistant soft-shell pants designed for highly aerobic activities. Four-way stretch lets you stay nimble on your feet as you hike or climb. Polyester/spandex fabric breathes, resists wind and moves freely. Durable water repellent finish sheds light precipitation. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Brushed tricot-lined inner waistband feels soft against the skin. Belt loops let you adjust waist with your own belt; zip-fly and snap closure. The North Face Nimble Pants for men feature hand pockets and 1 zippered rear pocket.
short_description: The North Face Nimble Pants for men are wind-resistant soft-shell pants designed for highly aerobic activities. Four-way stretch lets you stay nimble on your feet as you hike or climb.
